alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 18 at 9:16AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... East Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 816 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gateswood, Bay Springs, McKinnon, Tenile, Phillipsville, Barrineau Park, Carney and Pine Barren. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
